humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the invasive tumor as 2.5 cm, which falls within the range for T2 tumors (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage of a cancer is determined by the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the size of the invasive tumor is given as 2.5 cm. According to the TNM staging system for cancer, a T2 stage is assigned when the tumor is more than 2 cm in greatest dimension but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
